unalcol.evolution.haea

Class HaeaStep<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.search.population.PopulationSearch<T>
      • unalcol.evolution.haea.HaeaStep<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Search<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellularHaeaStep

    public class HaeaStep<T>
extends PopulationSearch<T>

    Title: HAEA

    Description: The Hybrid Adaptive Evolutionary Algorithm Offspring Generation strategy as proposed by Gomez in "Self Adaptation of Operator Rates in Evolutionary Algorithms", Proceedings of Gecco 2004.

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2010

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jonatan Gomez
